message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to let it go for $130.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $130 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $90?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product!
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  How about we settle at $100? That's my final offer.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $100. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $115. It's a great price, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of the product.
